# inertiaTensors

**Instance Property**

The inertia tensor based on the current rigid body’s orientation, or nil if inertia tensor information was not requested.

## Declaration

```swift
let inertiaTensors: UnsafeForceEffectBuffer<simd_float3x3>?
```
title: inertiaTensors
